Author: TheAllMightiest
Text: I did this recently, so I'll share what I think is important:   Know how to explain what your ED is, why and how it affects you, and why you want to recover.   Reassure your partner that it's not their fault for not noticing, should they try blaming themself. EDs are sneaky bastards and a very isolating disorder, so they often end up staying under wraps until they've become a serious health risk.   Know your goals for recovery and what you do and don't want your partner to do/say to help you achieve those goals.   Have some basic next steps outlined that they can help you with.   Express appreciation!!
